name: Karting in Hell
description:
Kart in grayness forever(not really)

I made this game in an hour and its terrible.

Run the game:

windows: open the exe file

linux: use wine to open the exe file

mac:  uhhhh I don't know

Controls:

space to jump

a to slow down

Goal:

get to the end of the level to beat the game. don't die from the enemies
